subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: The Rangers’ Mitch Moreland had an uncanny knack for putting the barrel of the bat on the ball, and, as a left-handed pitcher, can throw 93 miles per hour.
snippet: The Rangers’ Mitch Moreland had an uncanny knack for putting the barrel of the bat on the ball, and, as a left-handed pitcher, can throw 93 miles per hour.
